_sText:
Mg_beachrun_v2

Map by: DisConNecTed/DisCounTed (I use two names)

Some of you may have come across a map called "mg_beachrun," one of my earliest maps that I never finished. Well, somehow it got across servers so I decided to add some things to it and actually have some mg elements in it:

-Added a fence which CT's need to break
-Made it harder for CT's by not directly giving them weapons, instead they have to go looking around the beach
-Optomized a bit
-Deleted the scouts in bunkers, now they are in the trench and in a foxhole type thing that I created out of bordem
-Reduced fog
-Made it a lot lighter and easier to see
-Added some backround noise 
-The secret awp was left untouched
-Made the beach a bit longer
-Fixed the water not being visible to some people
-Added smokegrenades and flashbangs to CT's to help deal with campers that camp the top of the ropes
-Fixed the bug where you could climb up the cliff behind the rocks without using a rope

Not my best work, and you can't fire cannons sorry guys D: !!! Maybe I can get around to doing that in v3... I was kind of aiming for the look of Utah beach, but I failed at that and now it looks like something you'd find in a snowglobe... If you want to modify this map in anyway, or use some thing as a prefab you can go right ahead (so long as you give me credit as the original owner).
